verbs.description: [ARG0: some south koreans] [V: see] [ARG1: trusting kim jong un over nukes] [ARG2: as a gamble south koreans detect a change in the mood] but are skeptical about whether kim is genuine about nuclear weapons north korea pyongyang moon jae in joongang daily president donald trump united nations command president moon jae - in south korea u s koreans seoul singapore shin beomchul kang kyung - wha kim jong un korean peninsula donald trump kim eunsun kim daniel hurst kim joon - hyung professor panmunjom nbc news kim regime
